    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        protected java.util.Collection<java.lang.Object[]> parseFile(java.lang.String scenarioFile)
        Description copied from class: AbstractScenarioFileParser
        This method expects file parser to parse file and return collection of Object array of size 4. Elements of array should be as follow:
        Step call should be array containing:
        ["step-name-or-description-to-call", "inParams", "outParam", lineNo(optional)]
        Scenario Definition should be array containing:
        ["SCENARIO", "SCENARIO-name", "meta-data", lineNo(optional)]
        Step Definition should be array containing:
        ["STEP-DEF", "step-name-or-description", "meta-data", lineNo(optional)]

        Step-Def
        Specified by:
        parseFile in class AbstractScenarioFileParser
        Returns:

      • getCSVData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object[]> getCSVData(java.lang.String strFile,
                                            char separatorChar)
